title: Landlord to supply possession of dwelling unit
context: PART IV. LANDLORD OBLIGATIONS [ยง521-41] Landlord to supply possession of dwelling unit. The landlord shall, at the beginning of the agreed term, deliver possession of the dwelling unit to the tenant in the agreed condition unless otherwise agreed prior to delivery of possession. The landlord may bring an action for possession against any person wrongfully in possession including a holdover tenant. [L 1972, c 132, pt of ยง1]
